ds_id: Personal Capital Advisors Corp Raises Stake in Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL)@Defense World@2023-06-15 19:54:34.510646@Apple
data_content: Personal Capital Advisors Corp has increased its holdings in Apple by 0.8% in the fourth quarter, acquiring 15,100 shares, bringing its total holding of Apple shares to 1,883,649. At the end of Q4 2016, Personal Capital Advisors Corp's holdings in Apple were worth $244,743,000. Other hedge funds have also increased their stakes in Apple in a series of moves that saw some reduce their positions and others increase theirs, with the company accounting for around 1.2% of Personal Capital Advisors Corp's portfolio, making the stock its 17th largest position.
